title: Information Management Apps and Library Awesomeness /w Cecily Walker

author: Jay Miller
excerpt: Information management is a popular trend in software with many new apps bringing zettlekasten and other technique into the modern world. Library professional and recognized speaker on information studies Cecily Walker helps make sense of it (and nerds out a bit)

What is The PIT Show: Reflections and Interviews in the Tech World? This is the show where I sit down with people in the tech space and talk about what they are doing and how they get it all done.
html:
Information management is a popular trend in software with many new apps bringing zettlekasten and other technique into the modern world. Library professional and recognized speaker on information studies Cecily Walker helps make sense of it (and nerds out a bit)

What is The PIT Show: Reflections and Interviews in the Tech World?

This is the show where I sit down with people in the tech space and talk about what they are doing and how they get it all done.
